title: Janet - The Grandma with attitude. Primary role: Assassin
body:
Janet is an old Grandma who used her red handbag to hit her enemies like stereotipical grandmas in movies.

Passive - Janet humiliates her enemies, lowering their armor by 5% for each basic attack, this stacks up to 6 times (30% armor penetration)

Q - Janet dashes to a target enemy dealing a small amount of damage

W - On Janet's next basic attack, Janet picks her handbag above her head brings it down on her enemy with incredible force, dealing extra physical damage and slowing the target. 

E - Janet passively increases her attack damage for each enemy around her, she can also activate this ability to give her a boost of movement and attack speed.

R - Janet swings her handbag around her, cleaving all enemies around her for %80 of her attack damage before leaping into the air and slamming down on a target, stunning them and doing damage in a small area around them. 

I am totally open for suggestion lol this was just an experiment.
